item.description: “That Ammon Perkes is really coming along!” ~Damian Woetzel, president of Julliard and artistic director of the Vail Dance Festival 2020 has been a pretty strange year for me, and it’s hard to remember what all has happened.

item.title: Exploration is for suckers
item.description: I love exploration. When I was a kid, I spent most of my time wandering around the roads and woods near my house. I would leave after school on my bike and or roller blades and try to find roads parts of my neighborhood I’d never seen, or I would walk along the creek that ran though my backyard all the way to where it met the Pearl River.
